column4: how can i perform a command from the terminal on all of the files of a certain type in a folder? i've tried something like " ls *.rar|unrar-free " but i think i'm doing something wrong...
what command exactly are you trying to run?
front187 unrar-free x (extract files and preserve paths)
I don't think you have to use ls,  unrar should recognize * as a wildcard
